SEARCH:
Package ch.zhaw.card2brain.controller

Klasse UserRestController

java.lang.Object
ch.zhaw.card2brain.controller.UserRestController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/users") public class UserRestController extends Object
RestController class for User entity. It uses the Spring RestController annotation to indicate that it is a REST controller. It also uses the RequestMapping annotation to map the class to the "/api/users" endpoint. Each method uses the appropriate HTTP method annotation, such as @PostMapping,
Seit:
15.1.2023

  • Konstruktordetails

    • UserRestController

      @Autowired public UserRestController(UserServiceImpl userService, InfoService infoService, UserMapper userMapper)
      The constructor for the UserRestController class. It uses the @Autowired annotation to inject the necessary dependencies
      Parameter:
      userService - an implementation of the UserService interface to handle user-related logic
      infoService - a service class to handle user's information related logic
      userMapper - a mapper to map the user to dto and to dbo

  • Methodendetails

    • updateUser

      @PutMapping("/") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<UserDto> updateUser(@RequestBody UserDto userDto)
      Endpoint for updating a user's information. This endpoint is used to update a user's information by providing their new information in a UserDto object. The method takes in a UserDto object as a request body, which contains the updated information of the user. If the update is successful, it returns a ResponseEntity with the UserDto object as the body and a 200 OK status code.
      Parameter:
      userDto - a UserDto object containing the updated information of the user
      Gibt zurück:
      a ResponseEntity with the UserDto object as the body and a 200 OK status code if user update is successful

    • deleteUser

      @DeleteMapping("/") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<UserDto> deleteUser(@RequestParam long userId)
      Deletes a user by their ID.
      Parameter:
      userId - the user to delete
      Gibt zurück:
      a ResponseEntity with an HTTP status of OK if the user was successfully deleted

    • getAllUsers

      @GetMapping({"/",""}) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<UserDto>> getAllUsers()
      Retrieves a list of all users and returns them in the form of a ResponseEntity with an HttpStatus.OK status.
      Gibt zurück:
      A ResponseEntity containing a list of UserDto objects and an HttpStatus.OK status.

    • getInfosOfUser

      @GetMapping("/info") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<InfoDto>> getInfosOfUser(@RequestParam long userId)
      Retrieves a list of information for a user by their ID.
      Parameter:
      userId - the ID of the user
      Gibt zurück:
      a ResponseEntity with a list of InfoDto objects and an HTTP status of OK if the infos were successfully retrieved
